author: EXM7777
text:
how to master AI deep research in 3 steps:

1. tell it WHERE to look

don't let the AI decide sources
> you'll get random articles
> surface-level blog posts
> outdated information

instead: "search academic papers from 2024" or "analyze competitor websites in [industry]"

2. define the OUTPUT format

asking for "research on X" gets you a 3000-word essay nobody will read

be specific:
- "give me 10 actionable ideas"
- "create a comparison table"
- "list 5 key findings with sources"

3. load it with CONTEXT

the more background you give, the better the results
> your goals
> what you already know
> what you've tried
> who the audience is
